content: grace by anita gibney madebyanita co uk introduction the grace blanket started life in 2014 as a prize for a charity raffle i d never intended to write a pattern for it but had so many requests i finally released the pattern a year later it s had a few revisions since then but still contains all of the original step by step photographs and diagrams the theme for the raffle was pink so the original colourway has shades of pink and raspberry the new colourway uses all the same shades with the exception of the raspberry which has been swapped for duck egg details for both colourways can be found at the beginning of the pattern i now have a granddaughter called grace so this pattern is even more special to me it has been downloaded thousands of times and made by crocheters all over the world and i am delighted that you are making your own grace blanket too anita x © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or
